main event: Observers noticed 5 bright glowing objects traveling toward the east in Columbus, Indiana on April 16, 1966.
interesting points: The objects were compared to five baseballs due to their shape and steady reddish glow,The objects did not emit any sound,The sighting was reported by multiple witnesses,The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes and 30 seconds,The objects were seen moving very fast against the night sky.
